channel.title: How do I make a code for this?
channel.description: Can you guys help me on this. I've tried all I could and I just can't find codes equivelent to what I need. I need a code that starts up a new runserver.bat. You know so that a runserver.bat comes up as a new window, and yes I know if the current server was up I'd get that the server is already online, I can deal with that. I also need a code to close the current runserver.bat that's up. If anybody can help me with this that would be great, thanks.

item.title: How do I make a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Well sir, if you were smart, you would beable to backtrack through the auto-restarter code I pointed you to to see how it works. Then you would be able to extract the closing listener and opening a new one for your purposes.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a code for this?

item.title: How do I make a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Budda:

If you told me what it is for, I will help.

You’re weird, why does it matter I really don’t want to spend the time to get in depth with this I have to go hopefully somebody will have helped me with this by the time I get back although I doubt it though. Most people on this board aren’t helpful at all if you don’t want to know how to start your server, but hey there’s the few people that are the reason I posted this.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

Budda:

Then why do you want to close the server and reopen it if it is not going to restart it?

Well it’s to restart it but I don’t want a restarter, and I don’t see the point in getting in-depth on telling you what I’m doing with the code especially if you have no intent to help me with it.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:2, topic:100251”]Go to rune-server.org, search for “anime”.

A tut will come up with a working auto-restarter. It works perfectly. My server has been up for 4 days straight without 1 crash.[/quote]
I don’t want an autorestarter lol. This has nothing to do with that…

Read full topic
